original_text: They used gold to make all King Solomon's cups that he drank from. In the Palace of the Forest of Lebanon, all the dishes and other things were made with gold. They used pure gold. They did not make anything with silver. In Solomon's time, people did not think that silver was very valuable.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 마시는 그릇은 다 금이요 레바논 나무 궁의 그릇들도 다 정금이라 은 기물이 없으니 솔로몬의 시대에 은을 귀히 여기지 아니함은

sentences.original_text: They used gold to make all King Solomon's cups
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 솔로몬 왕의 모든 잔을 만들기 위해 금을 사용했다

sentences.original_text: In the Palace of the Forest of Lebanon
all the dishes and other things were made with gold
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 그릇과 다른 물건들은 금으로 만들어졌다

sentences.original_text: They did not make anything with silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 은으로 어떤 것도 만들지 않았다

sentences.original_text: people did not think that silver was very valuable
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 은이 매우 가치 있다고 생각하지 않았다
